mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.studentid AS "studentid", a.job AS "job", a.emolument AS "emolument", a.workaddress AS "workaddress", a.worknow AS "worknow", a.jobnature AS "jobnature", a.appendixid AS "appendixid", a.specialty AS "specialty", a.cname AS "cname", a.manage AS "manage", a.specialtyago AS "specialtyago", a.zw_class AS "zwClass", a.salary AS "salary", a.jobmiaoshu AS "jobmiaoshu", a.worktime AS "worktime", a.pro_name AS "proName", a.pro_time AS "proTime", a.pro_descripe AS "proDescripe", a.pro_duty AS "proDuty", a.pro_company AS "proCompany", a.sch_name AS "schName", a.sch_time AS "schTime", a.sch_profe AS "schProfe", a.istzhao AS "istzhao", a.degree AS "degree", a.px_time AS "pxTime", a.px_jigou AS "pxJigou", a.px_class AS "pxClass", a.yy_yuzhong AS "yyYuzhong", a.yy_ts AS "yyTs", a.yy_dx AS "yyDx", a.zs_name AS "zsName", a.zs_time AS "zsTime", a.selfassess AS "selfassess", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_sob( id, studentid, job, emolument, workaddress, worknow, jobnature, appendixid, specialty, cname, manage, specialtyago, zw_class, salary, jobmiaoshu, worktime, pro_name, pro_time, pro_descripe, pro_duty, pro_company, sch_name, sch_time, sch_profe, istzhao, degree, px_time, px_jigou, px_class, yy_yuzhong, yy_ts, yy_dx, zs_name, zs_time, selfassess, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{studentid}, #{job}, #{emolument}, #{workaddress}, #{worknow}, #{jobnature}, #{appendixid}, #{specialty}, #{cname}, #{manage}, #{specialtyago}, #{zwClass}, #{salary}, #{jobmiaoshu}, #{worktime}, #{proName}, #{proTime}, #{proDescripe}, #{proDuty}, #{proCompany}, #{schName}, #{schTime}, #{schProfe}, #{istzhao}, #{degree}, #{pxTime}, #{pxJigou}, #{pxClass}, #{yyYuzhong}, #{yyTs}, #{yyDx}, #{zsName}, #{zsTime}, #{selfassess}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_sob SET studentid = #{studentid}, job = #{job}, emolument = #{emolument}, workaddress = #{workaddress}, worknow = #{worknow}, jobnature = #{jobnature}, appendixid = #{appendixid}, specialty = #{specialty}, cname = #{cname}, manage = #{manage}, specialtyago = #{specialtyago}, zw_class = #{zwClass}, salary = #{salary}, jobmiaoshu = #{jobmiaoshu}, worktime = #{worktime}, pro_name = #{proName}, pro_time = #{proTime}, pro_descripe = #{proDescripe}, pro_duty = #{proDuty}, pro_company = #{proCompany}, sch_name = #{schName}, sch_time = #{schTime}, sch_profe = #{schProfe}, istzhao = #{istzhao}, degree = #{degree}, px_time = #{pxTime}, px_jigou = #{pxJigou}, px_class = #{pxClass}, yy_yuzhong = #{yyYuzhong}, yy_ts = #{yyTs}, yy_dx = #{yyDx}, zs_name = #{zsName}, zs_time = #{zsTime}, selfassess = #{selfassess}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
